text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

translation.en: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger - indeed, Allah is severe in penalty
translation.id: (Ketentuan) yang demikian itu adalah karena sesungguhnya mereka menentang Allah dan Rasul-Nya; dan barang siapa menentang Allah dan Rasul-Nya, sungguh, Allah sangat keras siksa-Nya
